verses.translation: Ndahiye umuseke,
N’amajoro cumi (ya mbere y’ukwezi gutagatifu kwa Dhul-Hijja),
N’ikitari igiharwe ndetse n’igiharwe (mu biremwa byose bya Allah),
N’ijoro iyo rihita,

verses.arabic_text: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ
verses.translation: Ese muri izo (ndahiro) ntiharimo ibimenyetso bifatika ku muntu ufite ubwenge (bituma areka ibyaha n’ubuhakanyi)?

verses.arabic_text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation: Ese (yewe Muhamadi) ntiwamenye uko Nyagasani wawe yagenje aba Adi?
(Abantu b’) Irama (bari barebare cyane), bafite n’inyubako ndende (zifite inkingi ndende),

verses.arabic_text: ٱلَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ
verses.translation: Bo (abo ba Irama) ntihigeze haremwa abandi bameze nka bo mu yindi mijyi.
N’aba Thamudu bacongaga urutare mu bibaya (bakarukoramo inyubako)?
Na Farawo wari ufite imambo (yazirikagaho abantu abakorera iyicarubozo)?
Ba bandi bakoze ubugizi bwa nabi mu mijyi,
Maze bayikwizamo ubwangizi bukabije,
Nuko Nyagasani wawe abasukaho ibihano bibabaza,
Mu by’ukuri Nyagasani wawe yiteguye guhana (inkozi z’ibibi).

verses.arabic_text: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَكۡرَمَنِ
verses.translation: Iyo Nyagasani agerageje umuntu, akamwubahisha akanamuhundagazaho ingabire, aravuga ati “Nyagasani wanjye yanyubahishije.”

verses.arabic_text: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
verses.translation: Nyamara yamugerageza akamugabanyiriza amafunguro, akavuga ati “Nyagasani wanjye yaransuzuguje!”
Oya! Ahubwo ntimugirira neza imfubyi,
Ndetse nta n’ubwo mubwirizanya kugaburira abakene!
Kandi murya imirage (y’abandi) mukayimara,
Ndetse mugakunda imitungo bikabije.

verses.arabic_text: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا
verses.translation: Oya! Umunsi isi izasandazwa (igacikamo ibice),
Nuko Nyagasani wawe akaza (guca imanza) ndetse n’abamalayika bari ku mirongo ikurikiranye,

verses.arabic_text: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: Kandi uwo munsi umuriro wa Jahanamu uzazanwa. Kuri uwo munsi, umuntu azibuka, ariko se uko kwibuka kuzamumarira iki?
Azicuza avuga ati “Iyaba nari narateganyirije ubuzima bwanjye (nkora ibikorwa byiza)!
Kuri uwo munsi ibihano (Allah) azahanisha nta wundi ushobora kubihanisha.
Kandi azanaboha (abahakanyi) ukuboha kutashoborwa n’undi uwo ari we wese.
(Umwemeramana azabwirwa ati) “Yewe roho ituje!”
“Garuka kwa Nyagasani wawe umwishimiye na We akwishimiye!”
“Maze winjire mu bagaragu banjye (b’intungane)”,
“Uninjire mu Ijuru ryanjye!”
